# Purpose
General exploration of how to implement osmdata and dodgr.

# Import
## Packages
```{r}
if (!require(pacman)) {install.packages("pacman")}
pacman::p_load(
  dodgr,
  tidyverse
)
```


## Data
```{r}
clt <- readRDS("./../data/streets_charlotte_nc_2021-03-15.RDS")
```

# Convert OSM to DODGR
Create weighted streetnet.
```{r}
clt_weighted <- weight_streetnet(x = clt$osm_lines)
```

Create contract graph
```{r}
clt_contract <- dodgr_contract_graph(clt_weighted)
clt_contract
```
